overview: Around the world hundreds of thousands of people, most of them over the age of 20, spend a significant portion of their life in front of the screen.  Socializing.  Making friends.  Chasing dragons.  Getting armor. Meeting soulmates.  they are willing to lose friends, family, and spouses to live a life "more real" than their own.
tagline: Lives Lost and Found in Virtual Worlds
title: Avatars Offline
